Articles.Content:
I am trying to play with KAX parts but when the game is loading the load bar gets as far as this and just gets stuck. Is there some kind of problem with the directory route of this file?

KAX/Parts/KAX_electricProp/KAX_electricProp/KAXelectricprop

http://i.imgur.com/7KlEn5f.jpg

This is probably from not having a FSCoolant resource defined, which is usually caused by not having Firespitter. Are you sure you have Firespitter and - if you do - that there's a Firespitter.cfg in the GameData\Firespitter\Resources folder?
I was almost sure i had firespitter from a different mod yes
yup i tried placing the firespitter file included with KAX in the Gamedata folder i am still having the problem.

Upload your output_log.txt per this stickied thread that says "read first" and I'll see what I can do

Edited January 1, 2016 by mythbusters844
I'd rather burn my eyeballs with a soldering iron than have to attempt editing urls with this garbage new editior
